To see the TV more clearly when having trouble seeing, the best option is to move closer. By moving closer to the TV, the image on the screen will occupy a larger portion of your visual field, making it easier to see and increasing the clarity of the image. 

Option (A) of closing your eyes would only make the situation worse, as you would not be able to see anything at all. Option (C) of eating is unrelated to improving visual clarity. Option (D) of dying is an unrealistic and unrelated option.
